0.text: Innate: Gragas periodically  heals for  6.5% of his maximum health upon casting an ability.

Active: Gragas rolls a cask to the target location, lasting for 4 seconds, granting  sight of the area, and fermenting over 2 seconds, during which it increases its damage and  slow strength, up to a maximum of  150% damage. Barrel Roll can be recast at any time within its duration after the cask has fully travelled, and does so automatically after its duration ends.

1.text: Recast: Gragas detonates the cask, dealing magic damage to all surrounding enemies, reduced by 30% against  minions, and  slowing them for 2 seconds.

0.text: Active: Gragas  channels for 0.75 seconds, drinking out of his brew, and gains  damage reduction for 2.5 seconds.

1.text: Upon completing the channel, Gragas'  next basic attack within 5 seconds has an  uncancellable windup, gains  50 bonus range and deals bonus magic damage to the target and nearby enemies, capped at 300 against  monsters.

0.text: Active: Gragas  charges in the target direction and stops upon colliding with an enemy, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies,  knocking them back, though not through terrain, and  stunning them for 1 second.

1.text: Body Slam's  cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds if Gragas hits an enemy.

2.text: Barrel Roll and  Explosive Cask can be cast during the dash.

0.text: Active: Gragas hurls a cask that travels to the target location over 0.55 seconds and explodes on impact, dealing magic damage to all enemies within the area and  knocking them back 900 units, though not through terrain, from the epicenter of the explosion, as well as briefly granting  sight of the area.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability power
+70 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Drain: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you can't gain mana, heal 45% of this value instead.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against  minions.

Keywords

Consume

Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+90 ability power
+25 ability haste
+300 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Soulrend: Damaging an enemy champion deals 125 (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage and grants you 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds, with the duration extending on subsequent triggers (30 (per champion) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SOULREND: Damaging an enemy champion deals 125 (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage and grants you 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds, with the duration extending on subsequent triggers (30 (per champion) second cooldown).

Keywords

  • scythe

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 ability power
+200 health
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% bonus mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% bonus mana.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  550

+45 armor

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – STASIS: Put yourself in  stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you  untargetable and  invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).

flatStats.concerningText: Upon completing the channel, Gragas'  next basic attack within 5 seconds has an  uncancellable windup, gains  50 bonus range and deals bonus magic damage to the target and nearby enemies, capped at 300 against  monsters.

0.concerningText: Active: Gragas  charges in the target direction and stops upon colliding with an enemy, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies,  knocking them back, though not through terrain, and  stunning them for 1 second.

Active: Gragas hurls a cask that travels to the target location over 0.55 seconds and explodes on impact, dealing magic damage to all enemies within the area and  knocking them back 900 units, though not through terrain, from the epicenter of the explosion, as well as briefly granting  sight of the area.
Recast: Gragas detonates the cask, dealing magic damage to all surrounding enemies, reduced by 30% against  minions, and  slowing them for 2 seconds.
